title: Ukrainian Tech Startups Dodging Bullets And Bombs But Keep Working To ‘Distract From Bad Thoughts’ - Forbes
content: Ukrainian Tech Startups Dodging Bullets And Bombs But Keep Working To ‘Distract From Bad Thoughts’  Forbes
description: “Today, Kyiv has been attacked all day long,” says Oleksandr Kosovan, the founder and CEO of Mac software utilities maker MacPaw. “The war is here, and it’s real. Right now, we answer these questions under the sounds of sirens calling people to hide in the nearest bomb shelters.”
